CustomField.description: If this is set to "true", the "Insert_DI_History" method of the "NI_DeploymentInstance_TriggerHandler" Apex Class is called when a change is made to a Deployment Instance record
CustomField.inlineHelpText: If this is set to "true", the "Insert_DI_History" method of the "NI_DeploymentInstance_TriggerHandler" Apex Class is called when a change is made to a Deployment Instance record
CustomField.label: Enabled
